description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Go giant hunting with friends online or in single player using your Avatar in a huge block based world! Mine for resources, craft the items you need then set out on an epic adventure together!  Build amazing creations in the offline and online creative mode too!
description.short: Go giant hunting with friends online or in single player using your Avatar in a huge block based world! Mine for resources, craft the items you need then set out on an epic adventure together!  Build amazing creations in the offline and online creative mode too!
